attributes.action: Make Pagan Weddings a Legaly Binding ceremony in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We as English people have a right to have a Pagan Wedding (Hand Fasting) as a legal ceremony of which it's NOT at present! This goes against our rights totally because as it stands you have to have a registry office ceremony before hand of which goes against the Pagan Belief! We should be allowed just one ceremony! We want the law changed! NOW!
